scripts.// advice: When using glob patterns (*/**) as command arguments, wrap the whole argument in quotes.
scripts.build:assets: node scripts/copy-assets || AREA=assets STEP=copy pnpm error
scripts.compile:assets: node scripts/copy-assets || AREA=assets STEP=copy pnpm error
scripts.clean:assets: node scripts/clean-assets || AREA=assets STEP=clean pnpm error
scripts.build:styles: SRC=$(node scripts/get-path scss source) && if-env SRC=! && echo "Skipping styles" && exit 0 || run-p --print-name --continue-on-error lint:styles compile:styles
scripts.lint:styles: SRC=$(node scripts/get-path scss source) && node scripts/lint-styles "$SRC/**/*.scss" || AREA=styles STEP=linting pnpm error
scripts.compile:styles: SRC=$(node scripts/get-path scss source) && if-env SRC=! && echo "Skipping styles" && exit 0 || DEST=$(node scripts/get-path scss target) pnpm _compile:styles
scripts.watch:styles: SRC=$(node scripts/get-path scss source) && nodemon --watch $SRC --ext scss --exec "pnpm build:styles"
scripts.build:scripts: SRC=$(node scripts/get-path js source) && if-env SRC=! && echo "Skipping scripts" && exit 0 || run-p --print-name --continue-on-error lint:scripts compile:scripts
scripts.lint:scripts: SRC=$(node scripts/get-path js source) && node scripts/lint-scripts $SRC || AREA=scripts STEP=linting pnpm error
scripts.compile:scripts: SRC=$(node scripts/get-path js source) && if-env SRC=! && echo "Skipping scripts" && exit 0 || DEST=$(node scripts/get-path js target) run-s --print-name _compile:scripts _minify:scripts
scripts._minify:scripts: node scripts/minify $DEST || AREA=scripts STEP=minifying pnpm error
scripts.watch:scripts: SRC=$(node scripts/get-path js source) && nodemon --watch $SRC --exec "pnpm build:scripts"
scripts.build:markdown: SRC=$(node scripts/get-path md source) && if-env SRC=! && echo "Skipping markdown" && exit 0 || pnpm lint:markdown
scripts.lint:markdown: SRC=$(node scripts/get-path md source) && node scripts/lint-markdown $SRC || AREA=markdown STEP=linting pnpm error
